channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-3556] Test "Path -> Alias" for explain extended
item.description:
Test framework masks output of "Path -> Alias" for explain extended. This makes it impossible to verify the output is right.

Design is to add a new entry "Truncated Path -> Alias" to MapredWork. It has the same content as "Path -> Alias" except the prefix including file schema and temp dir is removed. The following config will be used for prefix-removal:
METASTOREWAREHOUSE("hive.metastore.warehouse.dir", "/user/hive/warehouse"),

This will keep "Path -> Alias" intact and also test it's result is right.

The first use case is to verify list bucketing query's result is right.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: patch is available https://reviews.facebook.net/D5961
It's better than HIVE-3209

@Navis, thanks.

@Namit, I accidentally deleted "issue link" and just added it back.

patch is available https://reviews.facebook.net/D5961
gangtimliu, can you load the new patch file ?

Namit thank you very much Tim

Best wishes

Tim Liu (Liu , Gang)

Sent from my iPhone

Integrated in Hive-trunk-h0.21 #1736 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hive-trunk-h0.21/1736/)
